whatIs.question: What is Spendora?
whatIs.answer: Spendora is a free financial tracking application that helps you monitor your monthly expenses, categorize them, and create detailed statistics about your spending habits.

howToRegister.question: How do I register?
howToRegister.answer: Click the 'Register' button on the homepage, enter your details (name, email, password), and you can start using the application. Registration is completely free!

isFree.question: Is the application free?
isFree.answer: Yes, Spendora is currently completely free. There are no hidden costs or subscription fees.

dataSecure.question: Is my data secure?
dataSecure.answer: Yes! All data is stored encrypted and we use modern security protocols. Passwords are hashed and communication is protected with JWT tokens.

howToAddExpense.question: How do I add a new expense?
howToAddExpense.answer: After logging in, you'll find the 'New Expense' button on the homepage. Click it, enter the expense amount, category and date, then save.

statistics.question: What statistics can I see?
statistics.answer: Monthly and yearly summaries, category breakdowns, trends and comparisons. Charts visually present your spending habits.

mobile.question: Does it work on mobile?
mobile.answer: Yes! Spendora is fully responsive, so it's comfortable to use on all devices (phone, tablet, computer).

forgotPassword.question: I forgot my password, what should I do?
forgotPassword.answer: The password reset feature is currently under development. In the meantime, contact us on the contact page and we'll help.

deleteAccount.question: Can I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer: Yes, you'll find the account deletion option in the settings menu. Warning: this permanently deletes all your data!
